interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Calendar Girls
Review Date: 2014/03/26
Store: Helen Mirren  (Actor),     Julie Walters  (Actor),     Nigel Cole  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Comedy
Product Description: ["When 12 ordinary members of the Women's Institute, a prim and proper local ladies' club, decide they need to find a more compelling way to raise money for a new charity, they turn to their traditional annual calendar and give it a very untraditional twist. Behind the usual baked goods, the apple pressing, and the flower arrangements are the women -- completely nude! Starring 2003 Golden Globe nominee Helen Mirren (Best Actress, CALENDAR GIRLS) and Julie Walters (HARRY POTTER AND THE CHAMBER OF SECRETS), CALENDAR GIRLS is a terrifically entertaining comedy. And that's the naked truth."]
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Aspect Ratio': '2.35:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MFR786936227932#VG', 'Director': 'Nigel Cole', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Anamorphic, Color, Dolby, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 48 minutes', 'Release date': 'May 4, 2004', 'Actors': 'Helen Mirren, Julie Walters, John Alderton, Linda Bassett, Annette Crosbie', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish', 'Language': 'French, Unqualified, English (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Studio': 'TOUCHSTONE PICTURES', 'Writers': 'Juliette Towhidi, Tim Firth', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: Another movie I will be watching over and over for many years! It's a great movie for Girls Night In Movie Night! Wonderful story and fantastic performances by a star studded cast, a great mix of comedy and drama.
Review Title: A keeper
Rating: 5.0

Wonderful screen play. The parallel with the original books is good while incorporating modern situations. A fine mix of comedy and drama. Very enjoyable.
Great Performances

**User Summary:**

They enjoy adaptations that respect the integrity of the source material while offering modern updates. Their preference for nuanced performances is further emphasized by their high ratings for productions featuring esteemed actors, illustrating a deep appreciation for talent and character depth.

Recent interactions reflect their enjoyment of comedic narratives, particularly those that provide an engaging blend of humor and heartfelt moments. The user continues to seek content with superior audio options, reinforcing their sensitivity to dialogue clarity and immersive experiences, which suggests a commitment to accessibility. Additionally, their recognition of quality production values aligns with their interest in notable directors and writers involved in the storytelling process.

Their consistent trends indicate a fondness for intelligent narratives and captivating performances, as well as a preference for memorable, light-hearted content suitable for group viewing experiences, exemplifying their social approach to media consumption. Overall, the user’s selections highlight a desire for both entertainment and thoughtful storytelling, underpinned by strong performances and high production standards.
